result.title: Objective
result.description: Conserver l’écosystème Arganier important à l’échelle mondiale de la région SMD grâce au paiement de services écosystémiques et à l’utilisation durable de l’agro-biodiversité qui y est associée.

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: % Increase in revenues for PES suppliers taking part in the PES schemes.

baseline.comment: 0% Increase in revenues for PES suppliers taking part in the PES schemes.

target.comment: At least 10% Increase in revenues for PES suppliers taking part in the PES schemes.

actual.comment: 0% Increase in revenues for PES suppliers taking part in the PES schemes.

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Number of PES schemes

baseline.comment: 0 PES schemes

target.comment: At least 4 PES schemes

actual.comment: 0 PES schemes

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: Number of hectares covered in each agro-ecological zone.

baseline.comment: 0 hectares covered in each agro-ecological zone.

target.comment: 9715 hectares covered in each agro-ecological zone.

actual.comment: 0 hectares covered in each agro-ecological zone.

indicator.title: Indicator 4
indicator.description: Number of hectares identified for the upscaling of PES schemes at the end of Project

result.title: Outcome 1
result.description: Environnement plus propice à l’établissement et à la promotion de modèles PSE dans la région SMD et à l’intégration de l’approche au niveau national.

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: Legislation and regulations developed and proposed for the adoption, the establishment and the implementation of a national PES schemes.

baseline.comment:
No – no law on PES
a regulatory and an institutional framework adapted to PES has not yet been identified and developed at a regional or at the national level

target.comment: Yes - new legislation and regulations developed and proposed on the PES schemes

actual.comment: No – no law on PES yet at this stage

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Number of local and regional institutions actually engaged and supporting the PSE schemes

baseline.comment: 0 local and regional institution actually engaged and supporting the PSE schemes

target.comment: At least 4 local and regional institutions actually engaged and supporting the PSE schemes. (HCEFLCD, professional organization, ADA, ANDZOA)

actual.comment: 0 local and regional institution actually engaged and supporting the PSE schemes

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: Management Structure for the development of PES scheme and eco-certification of agro-biodiversity in the ABR implemented and operational

baseline.comment: No - no management structure is available

target.comment: Yes - Management Structure for the development of PES scheme and eco-certification of agro-biodiversity in the ABR implemented and operational

actual.comment: No - no management structure is available

result.title: Outcome 2
result.description: Renforcement des capacités pour mettre en œuvre et intégrer le paiement des services écosystémiques et l’utilisation durable de l’agro-biodiversité qui y est associée.

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: number of female suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

baseline.comment: 0 female supplier of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

target.comment: 70 female suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

actual.comment: 0 female supplier of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

indicator.title: Indicator 4
indicator.description: Number of male suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

baseline.comment: 0 male supplier of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

target.comment: 130 male suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

actual.comment: 4 male suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

indicator.title: Indicator 5
indicator.description: Number of suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

baseline.comment: 0 supplier of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

target.comment: 200 suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

actual.comment: 4 suppliers of ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

indicator.title: Indicator 6
indicator.description: Number of operators suppling ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

baseline.comment: 0 operator suppling ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

target.comment: 20 operators suppling ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

actual.comment: 12 operators suppling ecosystem services (ES) trained in the domain of PES, particularly in relation to the Argan and honey value chains

indicator.title: Indicator 7
indicator.description: Number of female Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

baseline.comment: 0 female Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

target.comment: 25 female Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

actual.comment: 8 female Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

indicator.title: Indicator 8
indicator.description: Number of male Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

baseline.comment: 0 male Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

target.comment: 45 male Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

actual.comment: 25 male Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

indicator.title: Indicator 9
indicator.description: number of Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

baseline.comment: 0 Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

target.comment: 70 Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

actual.comment: 33 Technicians and decisionmakers trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

indicator.title: Indicator 10
indicator.description: Number of NGOs/ Associations trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

baseline.comment: 0 NGOs/ Associations trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

target.comment: 20 NGOs/ Associations trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

actual.comment: 2 NGOs/ Associations trained in the design and implementation of PES schemes.

indicator.title: Indicator 11
indicator.description: Number of disseminated documents related to the capitalisation on PES at regional and national levels in Ar/ FR

baseline.comment: 0 document related to the capitalisation on PES at regional and national levels in Ar/ FR is disseminated.

target.comment: 1000 documents related to the capitalisation on PES at regional and national levels in Ar/ FR are disseminated.

actual.comment: 0 document related to the capitalisation on PES at regional and national levels in Ar/ FR is disseminated.

result.title: Outcome 3
result.description: Renforcement des entreprises biologiques respectueuses de la biodiversité par le biais d’une amélioration de la labellisation et de la commercialisation des produits du terroir issus de l’écosystème Arganier.

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: An ecolabel of the ABR is established and implemented

baseline.comment: No ecolabel of the ABR is established nor implemented yet

target.comment: No ecolabel of the ABR is established nor implemented yet

actual.comment: No ecolabel of the ABR is established nor implemented yet

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Number of professional organizations certified in accordance with the ABR eco-label

baseline.comment: 0 professional organizations certified in accordance with the ABR eco-label .

target.comment: At least 4 professional organizations certified in accordance with the ABR eco-label .

actual.comment: 0 professional organizations certified in accordance with the ABR eco-label .

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: A new protected geographical indication (PGI) label is established and implemented for honey.

baseline.comment: No- the PGI label is not yet established in the SMD region.

target.comment: Yes- a new protected geographical indications (PGI) label is established and implemented for the honey sector.

actual.comment: No- the PGI label is not yet established in the SMD region.

indicator.title: Indicator 4
indicator.description: % Increase in revenue for professional organizations using the dedicated space for ABRcertified products within the SMD regional logistical platform for marketing of local agricultural products.

baseline.comment: 0% Increase in revenue for professional organizations using the dedicated space for ABRcertified products within the SMD regional logistical platform for marketing of local agricultural products.

target.comment: at least 25% Increase in revenue for professional organizations using the dedicated space for ABRcertified products within the SMD regional logistical platform for marketing of local agricultural products.

actual.comment: 0% Increase in revenue for professional organizations using the dedicated space for ABRcertified products within the SMD regional logistical platform for marketing of local agricultural products.

indicator.title: Indicator 5
indicator.description: Number of professional organizations adopt the new protected geographical indications (PGI) label for honey

baseline.comment: 0 professional organization adopting the new protected geographical indication (PGI) label for honey

target.comment: At least 2 professional organizations adopt the new protected geographical indications (PGI) label for honey

actual.comment: 0 professional organization adopt the new protected geographical indications (PGI) label for honey

indicator.title: Indicator 6
indicator.description: Number of strategic marketing plans for certified Argan oil and honey value chains developed and adopted by responsible institutions and key stakeholders

baseline.comment: 0 strategic marketing plan for certified Argan oil and honey value chains developed and adopted by responsible institutions and key stakeholders

target.comment: 2 strategic marketing plans for certified Argan oil and honey value chains developed and adopted by responsible institutions and key stakeholders

actual.comment: 0 strategic marketing plan for certified Argan oil and honey value chains developed and adopted by responsible institutions and key stakeholders

result.title: Outcome 4
result.description: Renforcement de la conservation de l’agro-biodiversité dans l’écosystème Arganier par les modèles pilotes de PSE.

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: Number of developed PES schemes .

baseline.comment: 0 PES schemes developed.

target.comment: 4 PES schemes developed.

actual.comment: 0 PES schemes developed.

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Number of stakeholders taking part in the implementation of the PES schemes.

baseline.comment: 0 stakeholder is taking part in the implementation of the PES schemes.

target.comment: At least 8 stakeholders are taking part in the implementation of the PES schemes.

actual.comment: 0 stakeholders is taking part in the implementation of the PES schemes.

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: % Of PES audits executed in accordance with the established procedures

baseline.comment: 0% Of PES audits is executed in accordance with the established procedures

target.comment: At least 75% ( to 95%) Of PES audits is executed in accordance with the established procedures

actual.comment: 0% Of PES audits is executed in accordance with the established procedures

iati-activity.title: DELIO phase 2
iati-activity.description: Ce projet adopte une approche territoriale qui tient compte aussi bien de la dimension locale que régionale, en effet les projets pilotes sur un territoire pourraient ensuite être testés et appuyés dans les autres territoires du programme.

iati-activity.description: Programme de développement intégré de l'Oriental Phase 2: Ce projet adopte une approche territoriale qui tient compte aussi bien de la dimension locale que régionale.
